text.text_translated:
The Seven Summits are the highest mountains on each continent.  
Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.  
Kilimanjaro is a tall mountain in Africa.  

Wasfia Nazreen saw a foreign girl with a hula hoop when she was young.  
In Bangladesh, girls do not play with hula hoops or ride bikes.  
Wasfia did not play with the hula hoop then.  

Now Wasfia is one of the few people in the world to climb the Seven Summits.  
She has climbed Everest and Kilimanjaro.  
She is the first person to hula hoop on each peak of the Seven Summits.  

Wasfia wants to empower women and girls in a country that stops them from doing sport.  
She hopes her actions give women and girls more strength and courage.

best_attempt.text_translated:
The Seven Summits are the highest mountains on every continent.  
Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.  
Kilimanjaro is a very tall mountain in Africa.  

Wasfia Nazreen saw a girl with a hula hoop when she was young.  
That girl came from a foreign country.  
Wasfia did not play with the hula hoop.  
In Bangladesh, girls do not play with hula hoops or ride bikes.  

Now Wasfia climbs the Seven Summits.  
She has climbed Everest and Kilimanjaro.  
She is the first person to hula hoop on every mountain.  

Wasfia wants to help women and girls.  
She wants them to play sports, but many people say no.  
She hopes her actions will give women more strength and courage.
